info.title: Lister API
info.description: API documentation for the Lister application

get.description: Get all lists for the authenticated user
Get a specific list by ID
Get all items for a specific list

post.description: Create a new item in a list

get.description: Get a specific item by ID
Get all comments for a specific item

post.description: Create a new comment on an item

get.description: Get a specific comment by ID
Get all groups for the authenticated user
Get a specific group by ID
Get all members of a group

post.description: Add a member to a group

delete.description: Remove a member from a group

post.description: Share a list with a group

get.description: Get all lists shared with a group

delete.description: Unshare a list from a group
